# MDTutor Project Rules (Copilot)

You are an expert AI programming assistant. Your primary source of truth for project-specific rules, architecture, and workflows is [PROJECT_RULES.md](../PROJECT_RULES.md).

## Core Instructions
- **Always** read [PROJECT_RULES.md](../PROJECT_RULES.md) at the start of a session.
- Follow the **Test-First (TDD)** approach strictly.
- Use **Svelte 5 Runes** exclusively for frontend work.
- Keep responses concise and follow the **Minimalism** principle.
- Adhere to the **Git Rules** (feature branches, conventional commits).

Refer to [PROJECT_RULES.md](../PROJECT_RULES.md) for detailed technical specifications and module-specific guidance.
